name: Chess Master 3D
description:
Chess Master 3D is here! A game for Chess lovers. Packed with Immersive Graphics & Cool effects. Play with your friends or Challenge yourself with AI.
Relax and sharpen your Brain. One of the best-looking Chess games available on Mobile!

Features:
• Immersive 3D Graphics.
• Customize Pieces.
• Play vs AI.
• Play vs Friends.
• Calm Ambient Music.

Download now.....
